title: Memoirs of the life and writings of Thomas Chalmers...
author: Hanna, William
snippet: * I have been extremely indebted to A. Macduff, Esq., of Bonhard, the representative  of Mr. Smith, who has not only furnished the materials of the second chapter  in this volume, but has made every effort, though in vain, to recover the journal above alluded to.
